form.label: Push vs. Pull
form.description: This compares collecting high volume data sources (CloudTrail, Config, Cloudwatch Logs (e.g. VPCFLow Logs, etc.) by either using Heavy Forwarders for Pull or Kinesis Data Firehose for Push. Please note that beyond 50 Accounts, using Heavy Forwarders will not be cost effective both from a hardware and administration standpoint.

search.query:
| inputlookup hfrec | search num_accounts<=$num_accounts$ instance=$instance$
| eval num_hf=round($dv$/gb,0) | eval num_hf_account=round($num_accounts$/num_accounts) | eval num_hfs=if(num_hf>num_hf_account, num_hf, num_hf_account) | stats max(num_hfs) AS hfs | table hfs

| inputlookup instance_price.csv | search "Instance Type"="$instance$" Location="$region$" | stats sum(monthly_cost) AS "Cost" | eval ha_cost=Cost*$ha$*$hfs$ | eval network_cost=(($dv$*$perc$)*.15)*30 | join [| inputlookup aws_s3_storage_cost | search Location="$region$" | eval storage_cost=PricePerUnit*$dv$*30*$perc$ | table storage_cost]
| eval totalPullCost=storage_cost+network_cost+ha_cost | table totalPullCost

| inputlookup aws_firehose_prices | search Location="$region$" | eval monthly_cost=$monthly_cost$ | eval firehose_totalcost=case(monthly_cost>mvindex(StartingRange,0) AND monthly_cost<=tonumber(mvindex(EndingRange,0)), tonumber(mvindex(PricePerUnit,0))*monthly_cost, monthly_cost>=tonumber(mvindex(StartingRange,0)) AND monthly_cost<=tonumber(mvindex(EndingRange,0)),tonumber(mvindex(PricePerUnit,0))*tonumber(mvindex(EndingRange,0))+(monthly_cost-tonumber(mvindex(EndingRange,0)))*tonumber(mvindex(PricePerUnit,1)), monthly_cost>=tonumber(mvindex(StartingRange,0)) AND monthly_cost<=tonumber(mvindex(EndingRange,0)),tonumber(mvindex(PricePerUnit,0))*tonumber(mvindex(EndingRange,0))+tonumber(mvindex(PricePerUnit,1))*(tonumber(mvindex(EndingRange,1))-tonumber(mvindex(EndingRange,0)))+(monthly_cost-tonumber(mvindex(EndingRange,1)))*tonumber(mvindex(PricePerUnit,3))) | dedup firehose_totalcost | table firehose_totalcost
| join [| inputlookup aws_cloudwatch_pricelist.csv | search Location="$region$" | eval monthly_cost=$monthly_cost$ | eval cw_storage_cost=PricePerUnit*monthly_cost | table cw_storage_cost]
|join [| inputlookup aws_cloudwatch_aws_vended_logs_pricelist | search Location="$region$" | eval monthly_cost=$monthly_cost$ | eval cw_totalcost=case(monthly_cost>mvindex(StartingRange,0) AND monthly_cost<=tonumber(mvindex(EndingRange,0)), tonumber(mvindex(PricePerUnit,0))*monthly_cost, monthly_cost>=tonumber(mvindex(StartingRange,0)) AND monthly_cost<=tonumber(mvindex(EndingRange,0)),tonumber(mvindex(PricePerUnit,0))*tonumber(mvindex(EndingRange,0))+(monthly_cost-tonumber(mvindex(EndingRange,0)))*tonumber(mvindex(PricePerUnit,1)), monthly_cost>=tonumber(mvindex(StartingRange,0)) AND monthly_cost<=tonumber(mvindex(EndingRange,0)),tonumber(mvindex(PricePerUnit,0))*tonumber(mvindex(EndingRange,0))+tonumber(mvindex(PricePerUnit,1))*(tonumber(mvindex(EndingRange,1))-tonumber(mvindex(EndingRange,0)))+(monthly_cost-tonumber(mvindex(EndingRange,1)))*tonumber(mvindex(PricePerUnit,3))) | table cw_totalcost | dedup cw_totalcost]
| eval totalPushCost=cw_totalcost+cw_storage_cost+firehose_totalcost | table totalPushCost
| inputlookup cloud_gdi | search vendor=$cloud$ delivery=pull size=l | dedup datasources
| inputlookup instance_price.csv | search "Instance Type"=$instance$ Location="$region$" | stats sum(monthly_cost) AS "Cost" | eval ha_cost=Cost*$ha$*$hfs$ | table ha_cost
| inputlookup aws_s3_storage_cost | search Location="US East (N. Virginia)" | eval storage_cost=PricePerUnit*$dv$*30*$perc$ | table storage_cost
| inputlookup cloud_gdi | search vendor=$cloud$ delivery=push size=l | dedup datasources

| inputlookup aws_firehose_prices | search Location="$region$" | eval monthly_cost=$monthly_cost$ | eval firehose_totalcost=case(monthly_cost>mvindex(StartingRange,0) AND monthly_cost<=tonumber(mvindex(EndingRange,0)), tonumber(mvindex(PricePerUnit,0))*monthly_cost, monthly_cost>=tonumber(mvindex(StartingRange,0)) AND monthly_cost<=tonumber(mvindex(EndingRange,0)),tonumber(mvindex(PricePerUnit,0))*tonumber(mvindex(EndingRange,0))+(monthly_cost-tonumber(mvindex(EndingRange,0)))*tonumber(mvindex(PricePerUnit,1)), monthly_cost>=tonumber(mvindex(StartingRange,0)) AND monthly_cost<=tonumber(mvindex(EndingRange,0)),tonumber(mvindex(PricePerUnit,0))*tonumber(mvindex(EndingRange,0))+tonumber(mvindex(PricePerUnit,1))*(tonumber(mvindex(EndingRange,1))-tonumber(mvindex(EndingRange,0)))+(monthly_cost-tonumber(mvindex(EndingRange,1)))*tonumber(mvindex(PricePerUnit,3))) | dedup firehose_totalcost | table firehose_totalcost
| inputlookup aws_cloudwatch_pricelist.csv | search Location="$region$" | eval monthly_cost=$monthly_cost$ | eval cw_storage_cost=PricePerUnit*monthly_cost | table cw_storage_cost

| inputlookup aws_cloudwatch_aws_vended_logs_pricelist | search Location="$region$" | eval monthly_cost=$monthly_cost$ | eval cw_totalcost=case(monthly_cost>mvindex(StartingRange,0) AND monthly_cost<=tonumber(mvindex(EndingRange,0)), tonumber(mvindex(PricePerUnit,0))*monthly_cost, monthly_cost>=tonumber(mvindex(StartingRange,0)) AND monthly_cost<=tonumber(mvindex(EndingRange,0)),tonumber(mvindex(PricePerUnit,0))*tonumber(mvindex(EndingRange,0))+(monthly_cost-tonumber(mvindex(EndingRange,0)))*tonumber(mvindex(PricePerUnit,1)), monthly_cost>=tonumber(mvindex(StartingRange,0)) AND monthly_cost<=tonumber(mvindex(EndingRange,0)),tonumber(mvindex(PricePerUnit,0))*tonumber(mvindex(EndingRange,0))+tonumber(mvindex(PricePerUnit,1))*(tonumber(mvindex(EndingRange,1))-tonumber(mvindex(EndingRange,0)))+(monthly_cost-tonumber(mvindex(EndingRange,1)))*tonumber(mvindex(PricePerUnit,3))) | table cw_totalcost | dedup cw_totalcost
